Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: lyndajwells
Reviews.Content: bit concerned reading reviews apartments stayed 4 nights studio flat 11e letting agents helpful emailed doorman key ready desk apartment clean quality kitchen facilities able walk times squarecentral centre etc people 5 star hotel budget money stay york

Reviews.Title: “Don't Bother”
Reviews.Author: peachystar73
Reviews.Content: stay hassle worth paperwork sorted doormen owner particular unit help whatsoever fridge cleaner forgot defrost kitchen flooded shower curtain held properly lasted 1 shower taller 57 wont fit bed plus 10 minute walk straight 47th st times square parking door willing pay fortune opinion alot price looking time im york
